strings.evolution:
This is the power of the fairies, you know.
Wanna see how far I can go?
strings.affinity: Us fairies give gifts like this once we've become close to someone. It's been a long time since I've given a gift to a human, though.
strings.description: A young sprite from ancient times who fought to protect his village as it faced utter destruction by human hands. Sprites such as Timothy have been said to be blessed with amazing longevity, usually making them much older than what their youthful appearance tends to indicate. Although many agree that sprites disappeared from the world when their homes were destroyed by mankind, some theories claim that they actually ceded their lands to humans out of pity. Feeling sorry for their short and delicate lives, sprites are said to watch over humanity in secret to this day.
strings.fusion:
More! MORE!
I want to become stronger for you!
strings.summon:
Humans just can't stop fighting, can they?
That's okay, I'll help as much as I can.

strings.evolution:
I am stronger now.
It's like the protection of the forest gods.
strings.affinity: Us fairies give gifts like this once we've become close to someone. It's been a long time since I've given a gift to a human, though.
strings.description: A sprite from times past who dwelled in a small village within the forest with other magical creatures. Recent discoveries have found that Timothy and many others like him lost their homes at the hands of humans, who sought to further expand their territories. Many believe that this traumatic experience is what caused him to return as a vision, but asking him directly yields no straight answers, as he jokingly evades the question every time.
strings.fusion:
What kind of mischief should I get up to
now that I have this power?
Haha, just kidding!
strings.summon:
You use a very interesting kind of magic.
Mind if I tag along?

strings.affinity: Us fairies give gifts like this once we've become close to someone. It's been a long time since I've given a gift to a human, though.
strings.description: A magical creature called a "sprite" that was known to dwell in the forests long ago. Although sprites like Timothy are only ever seen in fairy-tales nowadays, even scholars who specialize in the subject have yet to agree on whether they ever existed in the first place. However, the personality of this particular sprite who reappeared as a vision of his former self closely resembles that of the charmful tricksters so often heard from in fables.
strings.fusion: Give me some more of that power you have!
strings.summon:
If you make fun of me for being small,
I'll write stuff all over your face!
